title: Virtual Reality-Based Safety Skills Education Design: Supporting Children with Autism Spectrum and Fetal Alcohol Spectrum Disorders

context.prior_knowledge: Introductory educational theory and overview of special education
context.additional_context: Strengthening competencies in designing and evaluating VR educational tools applicable to actual classroom environments.

learning_goals: Design three or more VR safety scenarios tailored to the cognitive characteristics of children with autism spectrum and fetal alcohol spectrum disorders
Develop an algorithm to implement animated character interactions that drive learner behavior in virtual reality environments
Establish a virtual-to-real-world behavior transfer assessment system to measure educational effectiveness
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
